    PS3Controller
    PS3Remote Class is suppose to act similar to the KeyListener but much simpler (i hope) it uses Jinput api (so yes you need to have the api) Website tutorial get the ipa into eclipse (or other) - http://goo.gl/kOWfCw NOTE this assumes the remote exist in the machine but it does not throw an error To use this you need to make an instance of this class in the instance it takes an int representing the player call isPressed to check if button is pressed call joystick to get the value of the x or y of left or right analog stick the values that represent the buttons are already made so no need to figure out which is which (that is if you are using a ps3 remote) THINGS THAT SHOULD BE ADDED add the ability to use the rumbler (might not be possible since i don't get any rumblers) needs to fix if the remote doesn't exist (add an exception or something) needs to add something to avoid repetition of remote THINGS ADDED (assumes remote does exist!)
